Message.Title: So Many Questions
Message.Msg: When did welfare become honorable? How can you tell if the 300-lb woman with 4 kids and an EBT card is a blind, disabled vet? Grandma voted for Romney. Isn't it really about Jose and K'shanda? Has the committee ever been surpassed as a method of doing nothing? Since Kerry was the head of Obama's Supercommittee that set up the cliff, why can't we kick him over it? How did we live with ourselves when we helped the unemployed for only 26 weeks? Who decided not to send gunships to save the heroes of Benghazi? If the innovative and hardworking few are going to improve our economy, should we just hand that to the undeserving now? Will the Fast & Furious impeachment hearings be televised?

Topic.Title: gop fiscal plan burdens the middleclass to spare the 2%

Message.Title: senate to intoduce gun ban bill...
Message.Msg: Sen. Feinstein is on the move. Any semi-automatic weapon that loads more than 10 rounds will be banned if the pols get their way. Interesting observation. The felon in Rochester NY who laid in wait for firemen used a .223 rifle. As a felon it was illegal for him to possess a firearm. Did that fact stop him? Would gun ban laws stop any criminal? Not a chance. Gun ban laws are for the lawful cits. For the left, I think that is precisely the point.

Topic.Title: senate to intoduce gun ban bill...

Message.Msg: the pols want anti-gun laws that they say are meant to prevent Newtown murders. But they don't prevent them, do they? Given that fact, why punish all who want those guns? More guns, less crime. It's a book written by John Lott.

Topic.Title: senate to intoduce gun ban bill...

Message.Msg: there is nothing in the constitution about drugs or speeders. With respect to firearms, there is this thing called the second amendment.

Topic.Title: senate to intoduce gun ban bill...

Message.Msg: hello annie. Spot-on answer. Merry Christmas to you and the family.

Topic.Title: senate to intoduce gun ban bill...

Message.Msg: Same to you seebe, I had a great Christmas and my son announced he and his wife are expecting again. That will make 6 so far between my kids. Had a busy year and just dropped by to see if the pies were still flying. Keep ducking. :o)

Message.Title: david gregory rips and ridicules NRA
Message.Msg: Yet Gregory sends his kids to an elitist DC private school where there are no less than 11 armed security personel on staff. Doesn't count the secret service staff who are at the same school to protect Obama's kids. Another lib case of do as I say, not what I do.

Topic.Title: senate to intoduce gun ban bill...

Message.Msg: we'd certainly be safer if more people could carry. More guns, less crime, a book written by John Lott. Completely documented.

Topic.Title: senate to intoduce gun ban bill...

Message.Msg: We have a government of the people. If "we the people" can't be trusted with guns and the government is nothing but people hired by "we the people" why should "we the people" trust our government with them.

Topic.Title: senate to intoduce gun ban bill...

Message.Msg: yeah, blame the guns. You probably ignored Annie's response on the subject. We don't blame cars when a speeding car kills someone. We blame the driver, do we not?

Message.Title: Gun Ban Bill
Message.Msg: The senate should include U-Haul trucks in the ban. Some crazy might load up one like McVeigh and drive it into a school. No one needs an automatic weapon unless it's just a collectors piece, but in light that criminals and crazies can obtain these, what defense do the rest of us have?
Is there any party more clueless than the donkey party. They think they know how to best confiscate and spend your money.
